DOC.brief_summary: To examine safety tolerance three dose oral vesnarinone HIV-infected patient CD4 count > 300 cells/mm3 .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study Three Doses OPC-8212 ( Vesnarinone ) HIV-Infected Persons With CD4+ Cell Number > 300 Cells/mm3
DOC.detailed_description: Twelve patient per dose level receive vesnarinone 1 3 dos 12 week . At least six patient give dose level must complete 2 week treatment dose escalated subsequent patient .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Allowed : Chemoprophylaxis Pneumocystis carinii , candida , mycobacteria , herpes simplex . Patients must : Asymptomatic HIV infection . CD4 count > 300 cells/mm3 . No prior AIDSdefining illness current constitutional symptom HIV disease . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Current history cardiac disease , include patient exhibit long QT syndrome EKG screening . Active malignancy cutaneous basal cell carcinoma situ carcinoma cervix . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Antiretroviral agent , include ddI , ddC , AZT . Immunosuppressive agent . Investigational HIV drugs/therapies include vaccine . Interferon . Steroids ( topical ) . Hematopoietins . Megestrol acetate . Trimethoprim/sulfamethoxazole excess 160 mg trimethoprim 800 mg sulfamethoxazole thrice weekly . Cytotoxic chemotherapy . Concurrent Treatment : Excluded : Radiation therapy . Patients follow prior condition exclude : Prior history cardiac disease . History agranulocytosis severe ( grade 3 ) druginduced neutropenia document abnormality granulocyte number function . Prior Medication : Excluded : AZT , ddI , ddC within 14 day prior study entry . Prior cytotoxic chemotherapy . Prior Treatment : Excluded : Radiation therapy ( include electron beam irradiation ) within 30 day prior study entry . Active illicit drug abuse .
